response.overview: "One of the last films about the King Alexander Karađorđević screened in 1934, the year of his tragic death. King Alexander Endowment, Memorial church of St. Archangel Michael with the crypt – the Temple of Glory, which is to be found underneath the whole church area, built in 1928 and icon-painted during 1933 by copies of the most renowned frescoes of the Serbian medieval monasteries." Yugoslav Cinematheque
response.title: Sanctification of the Temple of Glory in Skopje
